description: Comprehensive guide on how to interact with the web agent

usage_instructions.details: Use '/start-web-agent' endpoint to initiate the web agent. This starts the process and prepares the agent for web interactions.
Commands can be sent to the web agent using the '/command-web-agent' endpoint. This includes navigation, data scraping, and other web actions.
The agent's state can be updated using the '/update-state' endpoint. This is used for maintaining the current status of the web agent.
Retrieve the current state of the web agent using the '/poll' endpoint, providing information about the latest actions and the current page.
Invoke 'screenshot.js' to capture and save a screenshot of the current web page viewed by the agent.
Use 'vision_scraper.py' to process images, such as screenshots taken by the web agent, for data extraction and analysis.
Leverage 'web_agent.js' for automated interactions with web pages, including clicking links, filling forms, and navigating.
